DOC.brief_summary: Controlling glycemic impact foodstuff ( reduce glycemic load diet use soluble dietary fibre ) may reduce glycemic insulinemic response . This may turn result reduce inhibition postprandial fat oxidation rate lower plasma triacylglycerol concentration A high postprandial fat oxidation may result less lipid accumulation non-adipose tissue thereby improve insulin sensitivity metabolic profile long term .
DOC.brief_title: Soluble Dietary Fibres Prevention Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Overweight men woman regular smoker , athlete , diabetes mellitus
